Plot: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.
Title: Serena
Writer: Christopher Kyle (screenplay), Ron Rash (based on the book by)
Actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Bradley Cooper, Rhys Ifans, Sean Harris
tomatoConsensus: Serena unites an impressive array of talent on either side of the cameras -- then leaves viewers to wonder how it all went so wrong.
